Reviews.Title: Excellent computer esp. for the money!
Reviews.Author: Laney Lovell
Reviews.Content: I purchased this about a month ago to "upgrade" my Asus ROG laptop.  Having the SSD gets my computer up an running before I can blink. My games run flawlessly!! It is also very quiet, lighter weight than my Asus was, and is overall a beautiful piece of machinery. Couldn't be happier.

Reviews.Title: Very nice
Reviews.Author: cheesenfleas
Reviews.Content: I've had the P27k for a few weeks now. I had one driver failure after upgrade to Windows 8.1, but it was easily fixed with an automated driver update from the device manager. I primarily run Adobe Creative Cloud on this machine and it works flawlessly. The price was also extremely satisfying after viewing comparable products from other companies. There is a newer model out, but the only difference is a newer video card. I am confident enough in this computer to say that I will not be upgrading again (maybe max out the ram) for another 4-5 years... You will be pleased if you choose to purchase this.

Reviews.Title: The information on the title is partially incorrect
Reviews.Author: Peter
Reviews.Content: The add says that this is a Gigabyte P27K with a 15.6-inch display. But there is no 15.6-Inch version of the Gigabyte P27K, only a 17.3-inch display.Also in the description of the product it says that the display size is 17.3-inch.Hope you can correct the title or name of the product as it is misleading or incorrect, and will result in confusion.

ProductInfo.Features:
Intel Core i7 4700MQ 2.4 GHz
16 GB DDR3
1024 GB 5400 rpm Hard Drive, 128 GB Solid-State Drive
17.3-Inch Screen
Windows 8
ProductInfo.Name: Gigabyte P27K-CF2 17.3-Inch Laptop
